description: 1817NA Tournament: 3rd Wave - Piramidion v tobsu v JenFreeman v bendow
title: 1817NA

actions.message: Ha, I always like a early Denver bid
Well, we knew you'd be going after it eventually
Why do i always end up with Denver and Union bridge
I like the speed we are playing! My wave 2 game is still in Auction...
my wave 3 has caught up wave 2
You sure you want to par your company that high?  You can't afford to start a second one
sure :)
Ok, just figured you might want to either bid lower or go all in on a single company
Hmm, those 2+ trains went fast :)
yeah, thought i'd rush it a bit more
Pass the take a loan step, and offer to sell
I assume you were asking us to do that for you
Are you sure you want to sell?
Or did you mean pass both?
I think the comma must have confused me
Pass both, thanks for the other
We've blown past my wave 2 game, and nearly caught my wave 1
you can pass SR in sales
Passed Sr as requested
Remember coal tiles can't be upgraded
I think your run is better if you upgrade Mexico City.  Up to you, though.
but I
but I'd have to take a loan for that..
It costs the same as laying 2 tiles (if you just upgrade and don't place a second)
Also, if you want to buy a 3t, you'll need a loan anyway
yeah this is better : )
that hurt :(
Aww, I was hoping pw could somehow run its 2ts again
obvs couldn't let that happen
yowch that future interest
Yeah...
I'll admit, I was kinda hoping you wouldn't convert or merge
Sorry, should have done this as part of my last action
Ok, I've figured it out.  We are a bunch of masochists.
i always end up badly when all-out-short-war occurs.
This war is really more about interest rates than shorts
Ouch, by $1
that didn't got well :(
I'll admit, I was wondering if you were going to open the bidding at $1030
it was already so much to have offered 260
It would have been painful, but we would have gone into cash crisis to cover our shorts in gt... If I hadn't merged j and r, I think I might have gone bankrupt
(I'm theorizing if tobsu maxed his bid out)
That's why I didn't close one of my shorts in the nyow merger... I wanted to, but I needed to keep the liquidity more
i can't see any route to survive the round
You'll survive the round, since ple can track up more loans to cover interest (it's in acquisition, not liquidation)... But I think your only long term hope is if someone acquires it next.

If ple had come up for purchase first, I might have tried it, since if I won I could make sure pw would be able to pay its interest next or... But with it coming up first, I can't afford to let it try to stay afloat on its own while it's still possible interest could go back up (ugh)
Remember that this is in acquisition, so you're really bidding $496
thanks for the information
I don't want to see someone shoot themselves in the foot because of a silly misunderstanding :)
If you take a loan before paying, then half paying will also double jump
good point, thanks!
Oh, this game...
My mental image of this game is all four of us holding up a grenade, pulling out the pin, and screaming "I'll do it!"
(I imagined us all with our own grenades, though I guess if we were sharing one it would be a... Differently bizarre image)
i'm likely to go bankrupt anyway, if i'm going down i'm taking you guys with me
in fact it looks like we are sitting on a barrel of dynamite
:D I tried to resist jumping on the shorting train but then I jumped anyway
the problem is once the shorting has stopped you have to be in it as well
started even
Oh, I don't think any of us have the problem of not getting involved in the shorting...
The only company not getting shorted yet is ME... You sure you don't want to get in on that too?
i am tempted :)
I mean, at $70/share, you'll still be in the black after a single operating round (ignoring needing to cover the short).  What could go wrong?
it's got 2 4 trains :)
I mean besides that!
have we effectively turned this into a game of 1877?
If you ignore the first 3 stock rounds, then... Yeah, kinda
I feel like this is, if possible, even more evocative of Dr Strange love though
https://imgflip.com/i/4zf116
you can pass me
I think we might actually be finally drawing to a close
I won't short ME and there's not much else to do :)
Yeah, you can't say we were idle!
Foolish, well, the jury's still out...
it's been a fun ride, now let's see who survives :)
Have you ever played https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/713/nuclear-war ?
nah
Well, probably the majority of games end with everyone in the world dead after each nation's final strike wipes out the others
Not sure what made me think of it... :)
best lemmings voice "let's go!"
yeah, i thought you'd do that
It wasn't originally my plan... But for some reason plans changed
nice without debt :)
And here I was thinking he'd either buy the 3t from now or retain value for the acquisition round
From nyow rather
Sigh... We are going full suicide pact, aren't we?
Ahh, music to my ears :)
And here's where you bail out your other company, hoping to tread water better than anyone else?
yeah, that was my plan unless the 3s hadn't rusted
Or do you buy a 6t and say let it all burn?
Yeah, I had plans I liked better if the 3s didn't rust...
I wasn't holding my breath though
once tobsu set up DL&W i was ensuring the 3s rust
Yeah, I figured... Though I don't think it would have gone too well for you
just checking i get this right
I wasn't sure what to make of your starting a 10-share at 135 vs a 5 share at 200 though
bugger, forgot the whole rule about can't increase bid by more than 10
Oh, yeah, that's important
Otherwise piramidion could have just bankrupted all of us by having nyse buy now for an exorbitant amount
Nyow... Stupid autocorrect
gotta do work for a bit, sorry for the pause
Np... I'll just sit here, chewing my fingernails down to nubs...
Though just to clarify, if the 3ts had still been around when ur operated, I could have transferred money into j rather than stealing a train from ME
Which would have made my life easier
Even if you rusted the 3ts soon after
ohh, were you planning on having GT buy up PLE after it liquidated?
none of my options work very well :(
i think this is the best course of action
be interesting to see what happens to your other corps :)
Suddenly the other corps seem kind of irrelevant
i'm not great at 1817 when it becomes a short war
I think I was in a good position before the shortstorm, and I'm hoping to end up doing well afterward... But in the middle, it does throw everything for a loop.
Or maybe I should have said that in the middle it's a real shortshow...
(I don't have any choice on that cash crisis so undo if needed)
Hmm, fewer companies in acquisition than I expected...
Oh, sorry, didn't realize someone had passed after me.  I can re merge if people want to enforce it.
Actually, I'll just do that and keep it simple
haha, first time i've seen anyone go over cert limit in 1817
Another one to check off my bucket list!
aww, no fun
i wanted to see you pay $450 in interest a round
in fact I understood it immediately
You can hit redo if you undo too far
Did you mean to undo all the way to here?
Sorry, the undoing/redoing ended up messing up something; I think I have it fixed now.
Er... Let me reload and see if it's what I expected
Ok, I'm good
let me just work out how high i want to go
You mean how deep you want to dig? :)
let's sort this out :)
you gonna go all the way?
No.  How high do your want to go, though?
that's the operative question isn't it :)
let's see what happens...
Yeah, I really wanted that to go for cheaper...
Pretty sure I lose if I don't have another train though
I might still
Yeah, the interest rate not dropping threw off my calculations for pw avoiding liquidation this or.  Which I believe ends up being good news for piramidion.
And kind of good news for Jen?
(actually, now that I look again, pw was in trouble no matter what... I probably should have just sold it to ur instead of converting... Might have let me hold on another round anyway.

So, this may seem counter intuitive, but piramidion's clearest path to victory is to bid as high as he can on j, to ensure that tobsu gets knocked out before he can run.  Then he'll be able to knock out Jen in the OR, and let me self destruct when pw liquidates.

I bring this up because it lets me come in second, yes.  There are other paths to victory for him, but they involve bidding on a bunch of liquidated companies and I don't know exactly how they turn out.  Also, in the interest of completeness, he can decline to knock out Jen, ensuring I go bankrupt before her... Which would make me sad.
In any case, I don't have a path to victory other than hoping people really mess up, so I'd rather pitch my "the game ends before the next operating round" scenario.
Piramidion can't bid as high as I can.
but of course i bugger myself in the process :)

Interestingly enough, you actually have some incentive to bid up too.  If I win this bid for 610, piramidion can bankrupt you next or when nyow runs, eliminating you in 4th place.  If you bid 820, getting me to 830, you can secure 3rd place.
(if I pass and let you have it at 820, then both you and tobsu survive and I come in last, so I won't do that)
yeah, i think your right.

According to the discussion on discord right now, eliminations may be treated as simultaneous if they occur within the same round.  I don't think it changes the core argument, but it's different from what I was assuming.
which discord?
The tournament one
i'd rather get a ruling, as my behavior obviously changes depending
Definitely.  And undoing that bid is of course on the table.
i'll undo until we get it clarified
It sounds like there's enough clarity to move forward now...
$1 was missing :D that was well calculated
sowwy :)
Yeah, this game can be brutal
you never know :P
where we're going we don't need trains!
Of course, there was always the danger that would happen too...
Kingmaker
hehe
(jackmaker?)
i think we can all agree Piramidion has won
Oh, yeah... But now you two get to play another or.
better to earn little than to risk a lot
There was no risk... I go bankrupt this ar no matter what
just deciding who you want to be 2nd loser and who to be third
Yup
i'm tempted to see how long i can breath vapors for
Until nyow runs again, I expect :)
Bye :(
By
The messages are a little confusing in this stage... I needed to remove a token from my because I was in both halves
But yeah, see ya!
see you either at a cash crisis or in the stockround
sorry got meeting
jEANfREEMAN:BETTER FINISH AND DECLARE DEFEAT
however it was a good game, especially your very nice comments
come on let's do the last round and finish
for some reason i thought you were president of ME now
You're not the boss of ME!
I am the Antipresident!
antipresident xD
no idea works now :(
Please do not consume alcohol while taking antipresidents
short me to 100%, i might as well go out in style!
can i assume Piramidion will pass?
I can not help but pass
that ok?
it still doesn't work
oh fuck it, cba finding other ideas
live to fight another round!
Lol, you can even afford to outbid him
*cracks nuckles*
I think it was better not to :)
Quite possibly... Not much difference in price, but there were a few loans
time to put me out of my misery
You know, in my day interest was $45 per loan!
Uphill both ways!
i played with pushing the interest rate higher, might have been the better idea
i probably should't have shorted NYSW as much either
Than you
good game, i wonder if there was actually a route through that for me
What should I do, is it over?
What should I do, is it over?
JenFreeman:What should I do, is it over?
